channel.title: Auto restarter help
channel.description: hi, i put on my auto restarter when i go to sleep or go out, but around the fourth or fifth time it resets, the server just crashes, anyone know how to fix this so the server can stay up longer? i have the restarter set to every hour

item.title: Auto restarter help
item.dc:creator: @omg_ffs_ownd omg ffs ownd
item.description:
@omg_ffs_ownd wrote:

i will try to find 1 thanks, but id have to say bad advice on restarting server every 10 mins :\ that would be horrible for the members of the serve

Read full topic
